name: The Secret Life of Krasnoyarsk Anonimous
name_original: The Secret Life of Krasnoyarsk Anonimous
description:
The Secret Life of Krasnoyarsk Anonimous is an adventure game developed by Diccuric_Sigeon. It came out on 03-05-2022.
The Secret Life of Krasnoyarsk Anonimous is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
